name: Timon & Pumbaa's Jungle Games
overview: 4 Slimy Yet Satisfying Games - Jungle Pinball - You know you're in trouble when a warthog critiques your form. SlingShooter - Stretch some vine. Grab a handful of berries. Twaaang. Abrrgb! Splat! That's life in the jungle. Hippo Hop - Is it a river of carnivores or a river of hyena slobber? Your challenge is to not find out. Burper - Your odiferous task? Burp bugs into oblivion. - Multiple game levels challenge players of all ages! - Hundreds of wacky sound effects! - Play alone or with a friend - for 10 minutes or 10 hours!
